channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AMD suggests the next-gen Xbox will arrive in 2027
item.description: Microsoft could launch the next-generation Xbox console sometime in 2027, AMD CEO Lisa Su has revealed during the semiconductor company’s latest earnings call. Valve is on track to start shipping its AMD-powered Steam Machine early this year, she said, while Microsoft’s development of an Xbox with a semi-custom SOC from AMD is “progressing well to support a launch in 2027.” While it doesn’t necessarily mean Microsoft is releasing a new Xbox console next year, that seems to be the company’s current goal. Xbox president Sarah Bond announced Microsoft’s multi-year partnership with AMD for its con...

item.title: 9 amazing Valentine's Day gifts to show your other half how much you appreciate them
item.description: From flowers that will never wilt to portable coffee machines and smartwatches, there's a perfect Valentine's Day gift for that special someone to show how much you care.

item.title: This Gemini and ChatGPT trick will stop them from over-explaining everything
item.description: A precise prompt strategy can stop ChatGPT and Gemini from rambling.
